extendedInfo.description: Dark force overwhelmed the lost land, destroying the homeland where men and dinosaurs have lived in harmony for so long. Survivors are determined to unite with dinosaur allies and expel the evil off the land.- Build mines, pastures, stone quarries to prepare resources;- A variety of dinosaurs and ancient beasts wait for your recruitment;- Build Prey Fences, Terror Swamps, etc, to accommodate and recruit troops;- Win battles to obtain equipment strengthening your power;- Choose your weapons and armor to get equipped before fighting;- Jurassic Shop provides extra options of equipment for you;- Use crystals smartly to accelerate production, resurrect dead soldiers, etc.;- Increase population limit with decorations;- Log in often to win gold eggs;- Complete daily goals to win extra rewards;- Challenge other players online at Arena to improve your troop force.- Watch out "Overpower Rules" in central base.==========================Droidhen is the name behind Defender, Defender II, Dinosaur War, Miracle City, Basketball Shot, DH Texas Poker, Turbo Kids, Gun of Glory and many other top popular games. Droidhen is also marked as top developer by google.==========================

reviews.title: Its great but..
reviews.comment: Guys can I request you make another special event?:) please.. i will give you 5 stars if that happens:) thanks for these game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fix the stone consumption/production issue
reviews.comment: I have 3k stone, 470k fodder, and 360k meat. I think you need to fix something.
reviews.author: Steven Ray

reviews.title: Pretty cool game
reviews.comment: Nice game to pass the time with. Wish there was an easier way to earn crystals though. But you can\'t have everything you want...
reviews.author: Davion Roberts

reviews.title: Cow banana
reviews.comment: It\'s cool, a good game, yes awesome thank you I love myself.  NEEDS MORE EVENTS..UPDATES!
reviews.author: Shaun Marco Andales

reviews.title: really really good
reviews.comment: It is awesome all the levels are fun and exciting and cool
reviews.author: Dewayne Smith

reviews.title: Well done
reviews.comment: Lots of play ability. Game levels up in a way where there is always a challenge.
reviews.author: Joshua Kessluk

reviews.title: Cool ..
reviews.comment: Its cool .. best strategy games
reviews.author: Ilham Alfiansyah

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: The further I get the more I cant stop checking and playing. Every time I think it might start getting boring I lvl and there something new to do or see
reviews.author: Grace Mueller

reviews.title: Sadface
reviews.comment: I loved this game! I played it for about a year and was at level 44 (about 20,000 xp from 45). I got a new phone and couldn\'t recover my old account so I\'m done playing. I had it set up with my facebook but that apparently doesn\'t save your data. It was great while it lasted, but I\'m not restarting after being such a high level. Would recommend.
reviews.author: William Paddock

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: I just got to level 46 a minute ago and I\'d love to have fun with this game like I use to, but it takes way to long to level up. Takes too long to get new beasts, used to be fun but now its more of a chore to play this. I\'d spend and extra five to ten minutes getting stuff done around the house then messing with this. Don\'t want to delete it but I\'m thinking of it. I just read some other reviews and they haven\'t got deep into the game. Starts fast and fun then slows to a snails pace. Keep it fun
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not a bad game for the kids
reviews.comment: My kids like it. You can still play without spending money if you cant afford to. And if you do its good you get alot for a little.
reviews.author: Kimberly Dobrzykowski

reviews.comment: in the first time I played it, I felt im in prehistoric era, who taking care of these dinosaurus. So fun\tSo cute, so fun, so prehistoric game. . .
reviews.author: Christian Aguilar

reviews.title: Excellent game. Addictive..
reviews.comment: Would be good if the game offers speeding up.. post level 30 the game progressing to subsequent levels slow down a lot..
reviews.author: Prasanna Venkatesh Srinivasan

reviews.title: Fun to a point.
reviews.comment: Unless you intend to drop a lot of cash into the paid crystals the game will plateau, and you end up grinding in order to accomplish anything. Definitely worth a few days of fun, but long term it gets boring.
reviews.author: m freiert

reviews.title: Fun but has issues
reviews.comment: Game just restarted my entire game! is there any way to restore my game to where it was?
reviews.author: LeAnna Garten

reviews.title: Not happy
reviews.comment: Where are my crystals I buy 1000 crystals u took me money out of my card but no crystals over a hr already restarted app etc seriously wouldn\'t u have that section of the game sorted been playing for a while now but if my crystals don\'t arrive shortly I want my mo eyes back and will delete game and tell all of my playing friends of the issues please address otherwise ok game
reviews.author: adrian Sirtouchshimself

reviews.title: Fun to play
reviews.comment: A games with great wars and quest. The game could speed up it would make it fun.
reviews.author: Sheldon White

reviews.title: A slight malfunction...
reviews.comment: The game looks good and I\'d love to see how it plays, but for whatever reason it crashes every time I try to place the first building. It doesn\'t seem to lag at all, it just kinda stops running. I\'m not sure what to do about it and I\'d really appreciate some feedback.
reviews.author: Ves Heil

reviews.title: -Good game
reviews.comment: Played for 121 days as of logging in yesterday, logged in today and yesterdays game play has not been loged and my play days have been rolled back to 1 day continuous play, there must be a bug in the system.  Reported this to customer services but no response.
reviews.author: Paul Savage

reviews.title: I love this game.
reviews.comment: There in no a single problem I had this game since I baought my phone and us you can see my empire is so huge.!!
